title: MC Interview: AI is a ‘second leg up’ for BPM; EXL’s opportunity has tripled, says CEO Rohit Kapoor
description: In an interview with Moneycontrol from the US, Kapoor said EXL has been posting double-digit growth, driven by a business mix that is increasingly data- and AI-led, with artificial intelligence embedded into client workflows.
content:
It’s rare for a technology shift to breathe new life into a 26-year-old business process management (BPM) firm founded during the dotcom boom.
No wonder co-founder, chairman and CEO Rohit Kapoor describes the AI surge as a “boon,” a “tailwind,” and a... [10682 chars]

title: Merry Maga can’t buy taste with patriotic Christmas gifts
description: Plus: Ian Hislop’s run-in with artificial intelligence; the toll of climbing the greasy pole; DJ Kenny Everett’s unpredictability; and share Christmas creations
content:
Hislop’s Private ‘AI’ ire

title: Automated Christmas: AI brings new ways to shop for holiday gifts
description: NEW YORK — Major retail chains and tech companies are offering new or updated artificial intelligence tools in time for the holiday shopping season, hoping to give consumers an easier gift-buying experience and themselves an augmented share of online spending. Although AI-powered purchases are in early stages, the shopping assistants and agents rolled out by […]

title: Google Must Limit Default Contracts to One Year, Judge Rules
description: Alphabet Inc.’s Google must renegotiate any contract to make its search engine or artificial intelligence app the default for smartphones and other devices every year, a federal judge ruled.
content:
Alphabet Inc.’s Google must renegotiate any contract to make its search engine or artificial intelligence app the default for smartphones and other devices every year, a federal judge ruled.
Judge Amit Mehta in Washington sided with the US Justice De... [328 chars]

title: AI can dramatically speed up digitizing natural history collections
description: A new study from UNC-Chapel Hill researchers shows that advanced artificial intelligence tools, specifically large language models (LLMs), can accurately determine the locations where plant specimens were originally collected, a process known as georeferencing.
content: A new study from UNC-Chapel Hill researchers shows that advanced artificial intelligence tools, specifically large language models (LLMs), can accurately determine the locations where plant specimens were originally collected, a process known as geor... [2618 chars]

title: To AI or not to AI? Do college students appreciate the question?
description: Students are using AI tools more than ever. An Angelo State University professor designed a way to figure out if his students were using artificial intelligence on a recent paper.We speak with Will Teague, who says students are sacrificing their own agency to artificial intelligence. For sponsor-free episodes of Consider This, sign up for Consider This+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org. Email us at considerthis@npr.org.This episode was produced by Henry Larson and Karen Zamora, with additional reporting by Ayana Archie and Lee V. Gaines. It was edited by Justine Kenin and Courtney Dorning. Our executive producer is Sami Yenigun.
content:
Students are using AI tools more than ever.
An Angelo State University professor designed a way to figure out if his students were using artificial intelligence on a recent paper.
We speak with Will Teague, who says students are sacrificing their own... [393 chars]
